entry.title: Jason Todd needs to know when to stop
entry.summary:
Author: Chickenblue

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,456Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 12

Summary: “How much did you eat?” Jason looked away.“…Not that much.” “Define ‹not that much›,” Tim pressed. “One pizza. One burger… two burgers. Some chips. And… ice cream.” Tim’s jaw dropped.“An entire liter?! Jason, are you trying to kill yourself?”

entry.title: Operation: Chaos on the Runway
entry.summary:
Author: Hasunohana

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,683Chapters: 8/10Kudos: 106

Summary: In an epic celebration for reaching 4 million subscribers on Cass and Steph's channel, the duo decides to host a livestream guaranteed to break the internet. Their grand plan? Revealing to the world that the mysterious dancer "C" is none other than Cassandra Cain Wayne.But this revelation barely scratches the surface of the night's most explosive moments. With every family member determined to help celebrate, the fun atmosphere quickly escalates into a wild dance competition - because when have the Waynes ever done anything without turning it into a rivalry?Secretly rehearsed choreographies, ruthless judges, and a side bet about their boyfriends' reaction times turn the night into an absolute spectacle. The Batfamily's legendary intensity meets chaotic fun in this unforgettable livestream event where every move could spark new memes and every reveal sends the fandom into meltdown.

entry.title: Knights' Song
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,180Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 378

Summary: Due to a magic-based mishap, Batman's internal dichotomy is upended into an external dynamic. The rest of the Batfam and Justice League can only watch on, both fascinated and disturbed.Or...Bruce Wayne has never had so much free time on his hands. He decides to spend it coaxing a grumpy Bat into letting himself be adopted sideways into brotherhood, meddling in his sons' lives, and messing with the Justice League. This works out better than anyone could have reasonably anticipated.

entry.title: The Boy In The Bathtub
entry.summary:
Author: ToastedToad

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,262Chapters: 30/30Kudos: 267

Summary: Jason Todd is a broke 16-year-old kid trying to get home from his after-hours job. He hears a muffled noise in an alley, he almost ignores it. But then he sees a boy, younger than him, bruised and bleeding, half-conscious in the grip of some serious monsters. Jason jumps in. Fights dirty. Manages to scare them off just enough. He grabs the kid and runs. Doesn’t know his name. Leaves him with a call to 911 and a fake name.Meanwhile, Damian is found. He’s safe. But he’s traumatized, and he doesn’t remember who saved him, just that the person had a red hoodie.

entry.title: Blood and Stones
entry.summary:
Author: salvame

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,054Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 8

Summary: Before Gotham had a Dark Knight, it had a Queen. Lady Gotham, the last Vampire Goddess, made a pact with Thomas and Martha Wayne: a child, born of blood and shadow, in exchange for a debt never meant to be paid. That child grew into Bruce Wayne. He became a man. A father. A protector.But blood bargains do not vanish with time, and Lady Gotham has never forgotten her son.

entry.title: Cursed Child
entry.summary:
Author: J4YYYZ

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,172Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 196

Summary: Bruce gets de-aged into a 16-year old after being hit by an alien weapon from an attempted invasion.The 16 year old who trained under the LOA.The 16 year old who ran away from Alfred.The 16 year old who was manipulated into something else.The 16 year old who was made a weapon.The 16 year old who never had a childhood.Bruce tries to forget the days of when he trained under Ra's, but small habits and reflexes he thought were long gone start to resurface, along with memories being freshly remembered as if it was yesterday. It haunts him slowly, eating him out from the inside before taking action after playing with its food.

entry.title: Bruce's Incidental Grandchild Acquisition
entry.summary:
Author: sleepberries

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,640Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 256

Summary: Bruce Wayne had long accepted that life with his adopted family would never be conventional—but he wasn’t prepared for the tidal wave of grandchildren. Batman may be prepared for Gotham’s criminals, but nothing prepared him for becoming Grandpa.  (Or, five times Bruce is underprepared for a grandchild and one time he's overprepared.)

entry.title: Dad Test!
entry.summary:
Author: StarlaStar64

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,428Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 334

Summary: The first time it happens, Bruce doesn’t do a great job at hiding his surprise. It was only a couple weeks after Tim’s adoption was officially finalized - hyphenated name and all. Bruce still smiles to himself at the memory of reading ‘Timothy Jackson Drake-Wayne’ on those papers, trying not to choke up at his third son being the first to take the Wayne name. Of course that was never an expectation, but still, it meant something that Tim chose to take it.With that considered, perhaps Bruce shouldn’t have been quite so shocked by the teen calling him ‘Dad’, but he is. And he’s even more startled to hear it declared loudly as Tim abruptly sprints towards him down the hall at full speed.“Dad Test!”OrTim starts a trend in the family of jumping at Bruce at random, increasingly difficult times shouting: 'Dad Test!' to see if he'll catch them. This leads to many shenanigans & then crash lands into angst because of course it does.Inspired by a tumblr post by user incogneat-oh

entry.title: Being older doesn't free you from doing stupid things.
entry.summary:
Author: Chickenblue

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,513Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 25

Summary: "No... no, Jason..." Dick mumbled, but it was too late.A wave of nausea hit him, and in a matter of seconds, a considerable amount of vomit landed on Jason's chest and shoulders.The sound was so unpleasant that even Tim covered his face with his hands, letting out a "God, that was gross!".Jason froze for a moment, staring at his now-ruined and soaked sweatshirt. His expression shifted from horror to contained fury. "...I swear, Dick, that when you're done dying, I'm going to bury you in the backyard."

entry.title: Bearing the Pain
entry.summary:
Author: aerascreamer

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,156Chapters: 2/7Kudos: 17

Summary: The twelfth birthday of a child is one of the most important in their life, as they will finally be able to shift for the first time into their animal form.But sometimes, things don’t go as expected.Maybe it is genetics, maybe it is a physical issue, or maybe it is trauma, but some children aren't able to shift at all either for years or even for life.As Bruce reaches his twelfth birthday, he not only has to face this milestone without his parents who died years ago, but he also learns he is shiftless. And the high society of Gotham does not take kindly to shiftless individuals.Now, how will he deal with this fact? How is life as a shiftless person? Will he learn to be ok with it? Will it influence his relationships with his family?As time goes by, Bruce's family grew bigger despite the tragedy that struck him in his youth, and the man does his best given his condition to be there for them.

entry.title: And You, My Father, There on the Sad Height
entry.summary:
Author: notalegalist

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,228Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 222

Summary: Batman had long become resistant to Scarecrow’s Fear Toxin. Like he did with every villain he encountered, he had now had years of training combatting the vicious reagent, having developed multiple contingencies and mental tricks to escape its grasp. Yet, nothing had prepared him for a nearly imperceptible and slow-acting version of the drug.The Justice League begins to learn what the Dark Knight with no restraint looks like.
